amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require that all paper ballots used in an election for Federal office must be printed on recycled paper and applies to all elections occurring on or after January 1, 2021.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Rouda.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
